title: Nick and Kevin's Dodgeball Training Day (Knockout City)
description: It's going down for real this week! Greg Miller has thrown down the challenge with Valen Studios and their game Knockout City. If Kinda Funny defeats their dev team they will put the Kinda Funny logo in the game for all to use. So it's time for a training montage, first up in the gym Nick and Kevin!
